title: The Future of Food Systems
summary: Exploring how technology is transforming agriculture
description: In this podcast episode, we discuss emerging technologies in food systems and their potential impact on smallholder farmers worldwide.

title: Building Resilient Communities
description: This short documentary follows three communities as they implement local food security initiatives with support from IC-FOODS programs.

title: Digital Tools for Small Farmers
description: An in-depth article examining how mobile technology is helping smallholder farmers access markets and improve their livelihoods.
